Edges-Occultist -- Male Human Heroic Occultist
Attributes (13 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d12 Spirit: d10 Strength: d6 Vigor: d10
Skills (18 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Notice: (sma) d8 Riding: (agi) d6
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Science: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Performance: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d12
Intimidation: (spi) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d6
Size: 0
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 16; Edge: 6; Skill: 6
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Occultist); Eldritch Inspiration; Universal Ward; Wizard Hindrances: Hesitant; One Eye+; Stubborn Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Occultist): Has Corruption+ and Magic features
Magic: May take edges particular to Arcane Background (Magic)
One Eye+: Suffers -2 on visual tasks 5" distant
Stubborn: Never admits error
Combat
Parry: 7 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Kevlar Vest Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Bangstick (3d6); Sawed-Off Shotgun (3d6 R5"); Stake (d6+d4 R2"); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +5
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Universal Ward: Supernatural creatures cannot attack self (Spirit-4 neg)
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Occultist): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Eldritch Inspiration: May spend a Benny to cast any power of an appropriate rank from spellbook
Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change a Power trapping
